description: '''Fairground Attraction''' are a Scottish [[folk music|folk]] and [[soft rock]] band. They are best known for the 1988 [[hit record|hits]] "[[Perfect (Fairground Attraction song)|Perfect]]" and "[[Find My Love]]", both from their debut studio album ''[[The First of a Million Kisses]]''. The band won two [[Brit Awards]] in 1989, but broke up the following year to pursue solo careers. They reformed in 2024.
